SYSTEM: SparqlDQPGrupo.pdf: Página 33
Future Work (II)
• Study the semantics of Sparql to create new 
optimisers
• Create new optimisers based:
• On SPARQL
• How SQL optimisers work in SPARQL?
• Create data workflows using other OGSA-DAI 
resources
• Integrate in one single query queries to RDF stores 
and SQL DB?
speaker: SYSTEM
